title: Server Issues ?
body:
So I was in a ranked game playing like usual when I suddenly got an "Attempting to reconnect" 
so I exited the game and tried to reconnect and I get a black screen on the loading screen then this box pops up 
"unable to connect to the server please check your network connection and reconnect to your game"
 [Cancel] [Retry] 
I tried to reconnect about 30 times and it always gives me this message 
after about an hour the game "ended?" 
I tried to start a new game but I got this 
http://imgur.com/a/Er4CS
so I logged out and in again and the screen turned into the "reconnect" screen again..
http://imgur.com/a/QlsJ1
Euw server btw

replies.body: I'm not aware of any server issues happening currently.  It looks like your network is failing to connect to the game server or download assets, which would cause a black screen.  Give our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) a look to get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions.
It happens only on the EU Servers http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/LzbpIEEH-game-crashed-pls-try-reconnect-to-the-game?comment=0001

The thing is I started this game about 3 hours ago and it's still asking me to reconnect to it 
http://imgur.com/a/Qxtbv
